Summary: saw a red,with silver white moving at a moderate speed.
divs: Sighting Detailslooked out my back window, I saw a red moving disc ,with white and silver rotating. it went behind trees and I lost it. This also happened on the 29th. I was unable to sleep on both nights. everyone in the house was aslee p, except my cats. it moved from west to east, near Pleasantdale rd.I always know when they appear. it was not a plane, there was no sound.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There was one other sighting in Atlanta on or around October 30th 2008
